title: So uh..... Nemesis Jax?
body:
Just wondering, why has this chroma been disabled to purchase for almost a _**FULL MONTH?**_ (since 8/25)

"and are currently working on a resolution" ----------- HUH?

replies.body:
I just checked the store and Nemesis Jax Chromas are available for purchase at the moment. If you're having problems purchasing them, please let me know.

Let me know if you have any questions.

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=EH5TAAOA,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-09-22T23:53:08.901+0000)
>
> I just checked the store and Nemesis Jax Chromas are available for purchase at the moment. If you're having problems purchasing them, please let me know.
> 
> Let me know if you have any questions.

At the moment I posted, it was still currently offline. I guess it just happened to come back an hour after posting this. Thanks anyway :)
